name: Horseradish Crème Fraîche Sauce
description: This creamy, luscious sauce gets its bite from the combination of mustard and horseradish. Dollop it on steaks and chops, fish, chicken, roasted vegetables (especially broccoli and cauliflower) or a hot baked potato. If you can't get crème fraîche, sour cream is a fine substitute. This recipe is part of The New Essentials of French Cooking, a guide to definitive dishes every modern cook should master.
keywords: chives, crème fraîche, horseradish, mustard, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Freshly ground black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together all ingredients. Serve alongside steak.
